kv7.7:1.4_0: atthi tāya āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?
kv7.7:1.6_0: nanu na sukhavedaniyā na dukkhavedaniyā na adukkhamasukhavedaniyā,
kv7.7:1.7_0: natthi tāya āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?
kv7.7:1.11_0: natthi tāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv7.7:2.1_1: phasso sukhavedaniyo dukkhavedaniyo adukkhamasukhavedaniyo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dukkhāya …pe…
kv7.7:2.1_2: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto phassena sampayutto vedanāya sampayutto saññāya sampayutto cetanāya sampayutto cittena sampayutto sārammaṇo;
kv7.7:2.4_1: pathavī sukhavedaniyā dukkhavedaniyā adukkhamasukhavedaniyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dukkhāya …pe…
kv7.7:2.4_2: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā phassena sampayuttā vedanāya sampayuttā saññāya sampayuttā cetanāya sampayuttā cittena sampayuttā sārammaṇā;
kv7.7:2.5_0: atthi tāya āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?
kv7.7:2.7_0: pathavī kammavipāko, pathavī na sukhavedaniyā na dukkhavedaniyā …pe… anārammaṇā;
kv7.7:2.10_0: Phasso kammavipāko, phasso na sukhavedaniyo na dukkhavedaniyo …pe… anārammaṇo;
kv7.7:4.1_0: Labbhā pathavī ketuṁ vikketuṁ āṭhapetuṁ ocinituṁ vicinitunti?
kv7.7:4.3_0: Labbhā kammavipāko ketuṁ vikketuṁ āṭhapetuṁ ocinituṁ vicinitunti?
kv7.7:9.3_0: Paṭhamaṁ pathavī saṇṭhāti, pacchā sattā uppajjantīti?
kv7.7:9.5_0: Paṭhamaṁ vipāko uppajjati, pacchā vipākapaṭilābhāya kammaṁ karontīti?
kv7.7:11.9_0: Cakkavattisattassa phassaṁ vedanaṁ saññaṁ cetanaṁ cittaṁ saddhaṁ vīriyaṁ satiṁ samādhiṁ paññaṁ aññe sattā paribhuñjantīti?
kv7.7:12.4_0: Nanu atthi issariyasaṁvattaniyaṁ kammaṁ adhipaccasaṁvattaniyaṁ kammanti?
kv7.7:12.6_0: Hañci atthi issariyasaṁvattaniyaṁ kammaṁ adhipaccasaṁvattaniyaṁ kammaṁ, tena vata re vattabbe—
